com.soen.risk.helper

Class RiskMapEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.helper.RiskMapEditor

  • public class RiskMapEditor
extends java.lang.Object

    User Map Editor

    This class is used for editing the user created map, where user is given an option to Add or Delete continents or territories, appropriate input is taken and continents/territories are deleted from the map file and validated before uploading the map for the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Shashank Rao

    • Constructor Detail

      • RiskMapEditor

        public RiskMapEditor(java.util.List<java.lang.String> mapFile)

        User Map Editor Constructor

        The constructor is called when an object of the RiskMapEditor class is created. The constructor is responsible to parse the passed map file into different ArrayLists containing the continents and territories
        Parameters:
        mapFile - Contains the entire map.txt file in ArrayList format used for parsing into continent and territory list.

    • Method Detail

      • editMap

        public void editMap()

        Implementation of Edit Map functionality

        The method editMap() is used for interaction with user. The method takes input from user on addition/deletion of continents or territories.

      • fullMapList

        public void fullMapList()

        Concatenation of ArrayList

        The fullMapList() method is used to create a concatenated list of ArrayList.
